metadata.title: CVE-2024-26594 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: ksmbd:validate mech token in session setup If client send invalid mech token insession setup request, ksmbd validate and make the error if it is invalid.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
